attributes.action: Tobacco and Alcohol should not be available in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
On the basis that tobacco and alcohol are known to be seriously bad for your health and addictive, the UK should be proud to have no part in the pepetuation of the consumption of either product.

It should be illegal to smoke and drink alcohol.  It should be illegal to make money from the sale, distribution or manufacture of either.

It is completely hypocritical to complain about the effects of these products on one hand and allow profiteering from it on the other.  Lead the way UK.
